alert.note: Alert for Clarion; Forest; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 2:02PM EDT until July 28 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Venango County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Northern Clarion County in west central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Forest County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 202 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Knox, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Knox, Shippenville, Fryburg, Leeper, and Cook Forest State Park. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 48 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
